column4: Ok.  It appears I was wrong earlier, it was indeed an alsa setting (sound card port) that was muted.  In my defense however, the port works when it is muted (MM), which is completely and utterly fucked up (hey I've been using alsa since linux 2.6.0). Anyway sorry for the outburst
we prefer to keep bad language out of our channels too
bad language is very subjective culture-dependant
